content.body: I wonder if we should start moderating "Update?" comments. Or would that just create more of them? I'd be inclined to mark them as "Off topic" and see how it goes.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I wonder if we should start moderating "Update?" comments. Or would that just create more of them? I'd be inclined to mark them as "Off topic" and see how it goes.
